biocontainers.name: gapfiller
biocontainers.summary: Gapfiller is a seed-and-extend local assembler to fill the gap within paired reads.

biotools.summary: GapFiller is an automated strategy, called to reliably close gaps within scaffolds using paired reads.

bioschemas.name: Gapfiller
bioschemas.summary: GapFiller is an automated strategy, called to reliably close gaps within scaffolds using paired reads.
